body.name: AWEI Smart Watch for Men Women(Answer/Make Calls), 1.45" HD Touch Screen Fitness Watch with Sleep Heart Rate Monitor, 100+Sports Modes, IP68 Waterproof Activity Trackers Compatible with Android iOS
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ⌚【Rugged HD Outdoor Smart Watch】Awei outdoor smart watch is made of special aluminum alloy material. It has passed a number of tests such as extreme temperature, low pressure, antifog and dust resistance. Our smart watches for men ensures that you use them confidently in a variety of harsh conditions.

⌚【Bluetooth Call and Message Reminder】With its built-in speakers and Bluetooth connectivity, this AWEI smart watch allows you to make and receive calls and acts as a multimedia player for your phone. It also supports information reminders and social media notifications. All notifications are displayed on your wrist and reminded by vibration, so you won't miss any important calls or messages while out for a walk or workout, even if you put your phone in your pocket.

⌚【1.45" Touch Screen and DIY Watch Faces】 Smart watch with 1.45" HD full touch color screen brings you a unique visual and better interactive experience. Fitness smart watch has 200+ free watch faces that can be downloaded and used in the app. In addition, you can even customize your dial wallpaper with your favorite photos.

⌚【Heart Rate, Sleep, Blood & Activity Tracking】With our smartwatch, it accurately monitors your heart rate in real time. Also, it provides a detailed analysis of your sleep quality by continuously recording your sleep patterns. During exercise, our smartwatch automatically records daily steps, distance counter, calories burned, active minutes, measure your blood oxygen saturation and understand your physical state.

⌚【100+ Sports Modes Sports】The smart watch for men and women supports 100+ sports modes indoors and outdoors, choose from the selected modes or add via Veryfit APP to set up your training program and track your workout statistics.

⌚【Long Battery & IP68 Waterproof】The smartwatch only takes 2 hours to charge and can be used for 5-7 days or 60 days standby time, much longer than most traditional watches. The fitness watch is IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when washing hands, in the rain.

【The Best Gift to Give】The smartwatch fashion design make it an excellent present for parents and children on various festive occasions. It's the best gift for birthdays, everyday gift giving, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Graduation, etc. Elevate gifting to a whole new level with this smart watch.

1. Download the "GloryFit" APP. Scan the QR code or search and download in the APP store. 2. Turn on your phone's Bluetooth 3. Open the “GloryFit” APP, find and click “ADD A DEVICE”. 4. Search for "WH1 PRO" and click to connect . Note: Some functions of the watch must be connected to the Bluetooth of your cell phone before you can use it. In order to have a better experience, We suggest you to connect the Bluetooth of your cell phone before you experience the various functions of the smartwatch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this smart watch. It is very useful when running and doing sports training. The appearance is nice and the battery life is better than my previous watches. It is pretty easy to use and get used to. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost comparable with Garmin Heart Monitor
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a cyclist I was skeptical about the accuracy of this smart watch.After running few tests against my Garmin Heart Monitor strapped to chest I was surprised by how closes the reading result are.Update Review. 1/29/24Even setting up the screen to 15 secs (maximum screen time) The heart keeps spinning and cannot find the exactly bpm while the screen is opened.Returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great watch.
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch as a gift for my husband and he likes it. He has a lot of trouble wearing watches because other watches batteries run down fast. This one is rechargeable and he can wear this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice watch great price happy with purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Not super durable and started to malfunction after a few weeks but it’s cheap and that’s kinda what I expected. They dis take it back and return the money so I’m not disappointed in any way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water Proof Watch⌚️
reviews.reviewText: The watch is very light to wear; it is comfortable to wear when running, and it has complete functions, including timing and step counting. The strap is of good quality and the screen display is also very clear. You can answer calls and measure heart rate and blood oxygen at any time. Recommended!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made my dad happy!!!
reviews.reviewText: My dad was told by his doctor told, walk at least 5-8mile every day. I was looking for a watch for his birthday gift. 3-4weeks ago, we had his birthday and I presented his new watch and I see big smile in his face when he open his gift and knew how it works although he doesn’t expect anything from anyone. He even told me how he is using it every day to follow his doctor advice. Looks like it is good gift choice for whoever is needed walk a lot or run.
